messages.subject: Medieval story making site
messages.msgSnippet: With the talk of castles and such recently I thought some of you may like this site. Sounds like fun to me. Barb E If you don t like how things are, change
messages.messageBody:
With the talk of castles and such recently I thought some of you may
like this site. Sounds like fun to me.


Barb E

"If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not
a tree. You have the ability to totally transform every
area in your life - and it all begins with your very own
power of choice."

- Jim Rohn, Author and speaker




AND NOW FOR TODAY'S SITE... Ye olde story

Create your own medieval story. This Flash site lets you create a
story by adding people, buildings, animals, trees and text. You can
add as many as scenes as you want. It's like creating a historical
comic strip.

You might choose to write a story about hunting beasts or a kindly
king. After you're done, upload your story to a central gallery or
e-mail it to friends.

TO VISIT THIS SITE, GO HERE:
http://www.adgame-wonderland.de/type/bayeux.php


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
